Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Chemistry Products CRSC DT Slides
VITROS Chemistry Products DT Calibrator Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS Chemistry Products CRSC DT Slides assay and DT Calibrator Kit for quantitative measurement of creatinine in serum and plasma on VITROS DT60/DT60II Chemistry Systems.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use; the slides quantitatively measure creatinine in serum and plasma to aid diagnosis and monitoring of renal disease, and the calibrator kit provides calibration for multiple analytes including creatinine on VITROS DT Chemistry Systems.
